basic.Target Organism: Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli D21 (MIC=0.36 µM), Escherichia coli D31 (MIC=0.30 µM), Serratia marsescens (MIC=2.6 µM), Serratia marsescens Strain 122 (MIC=12 µM), Pseudomonas aeruginosa OT97 (MIC=2.9 µM), Xenorhabdus nematophilus Xn21 (MIC=1.6 µM);Gram-positive bacteria:Bacillus subtilis Bsll (MIC=17 µM), Bacillus megaterium Bmll (MIC=0.64 µM), Bacillus thuringiensis Btll (MIC>88 µM), Streptococcus fecalis Ds16 (MIC>88 µM), Streptococcus fecalis AD-4 (MIC>88 µM), Micrococcus luteus MI11 (MIC=0.29 µM).
